FragilityCurve.Description: Costing to be furnished by user. Consequence data assumes 16 SF of damage area.
FragilityCurve.Name: Home entertainment equipment, unknown installation
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes:
This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data. Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence.
Import errors:
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.020:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace equipment. User must supply replacement cost.
